page.title: 01GENERAL DESCRIPTION
page.content: OUR BLOCK IS A RURAL AREA. THERE ARE A PAIR OF TWO SMALL VILLAGES, LONG SUTTON AND SOUTH WARNBOROUGH, AND A PART OF A SMALL ESTATE OF MARRIED QUARTERS. THE HOUSES IN THE VILLAGE ARE MAINLY QUITE OLD BUT THERE IS ONE SMALL MODERN DEVELOPMENT.THERE ARE NO EXTENSIVE SHOPPING FACILITIES,OR RECREATIONAL AMENITIES AND NO INDUSTRY EXCEPT FOR FARMING WHICH IS MIXED. MOST OF THE LAND IS OPEN ROLLING COUNTRY SIDE WITH A FEW CLUMPS OF TREES AND HEDGES. THE R.A.F. AIRFIELD COVERS MOSTOF THE LAND TO THE NORTH OF THE BLOCK AND THIS IS FAIRLY FLAT AND OPEN. THERE ARE GOOD ROAD AND RAIL LINKS ABOUT THREE MILES AWAY WHICH MAKES LONDON, 40 MILES TO THE E.N.E., EASILY ACCESSIBLE TO COMMUTERS WHO LIVE IN GREAT NUMBERS IN THE AREA.
